phrases: The world has become a superhuman society,
and about 80 of the world's population now has some kind of special trait.
In this world swirling with chaos,
the profession that everyone once dreamed about and admired
came into the limelight.
Heroes of justice fighting villains and saving people from distress.
Yes, this is the story of how I became the greatest hero.
The feelings of the three...
I am carrying all that right now!
I took the one on his head where his guard was the weakest.
Midoriya, this was thanks to the opening you created with your last spurt.
In fourth place, Team Midoriya!
They will advance...
The Boy Born with Everything
Now, we will break for lunch before we start the afternoon festivities!
See ya!
I am hungry.
I am hungry!
Food!
Let us hurry up and go eat.
Faculty and Student Entrance
So...
What did you want to talk about?
If we do not hurry, the cafeteria will probably be really crowded...
Um...
He gives off a cold intimidation, different from Kacchan...
I was overpowered.
So much so that I broke my pledge.
He did not use it even if it would be to his advantage...
His left side...
Iida, Kaminari, Yaoyorozu, Tokoyami, Uraraka...
None of them felt it.
At that last instant,
I was the only one who was overpowered.
Only me, who had experienced All Might's full power up close.
What... does... that mean...?
It means I felt something similar coming from you.
Midoriya, are you...
Secret... love child...?!
All Might has his eye on you, does not he?
I-I see...
So that is what he was thinking!
Well?
Are you?
Th-That is not it!
I mean, even if I was, I would say I was not, so I do not think you would believe me,
but anyway, that is not how it is...
In the first place, let me ask you something...
Why do you think that about me...?
Since you said, that is not how it is,
that means there is a connection between
you two that you cannot talk about, right?
Endeavor's my old man.
I am sure you know that he is been stuck as the number two hero for forever.
If you have something from the number one hero, then I...
Hey!
Long time no see!
Let us have tea, Endeavor!
All Might...
I have not seen you since that talk we had with the press ten years ago, huh?
I saw you, so I thought I would say hi.
I see.
Well, you have already done that.
Leave me.
Tea?
What a joke.
I am going to the restroom.
Begone!
Do not be so cold!
Your son, Young Shoto, did wonderfully without even using half of his power.
Is it because he was taught well?
What are you trying to say?
Why, I seriously want to know
how to raise the next generation.
Do you think I would tell you?
You look clueless as usual, and it is getting on my nerves.
Sorry...
Just remember this-
I will make that into a hero that will surpass you one day.
That was why I created him.
What are you...?
He is in his rebellious stage right now,
but he will definitely surpass you.
I will make sure of it!
My old man has a strong desire to rise in the world.
As a hero, he won a name for himself with crushing force.
Because of that, the living legend, All Might, is a great eyesore to him.
Since he could not surpass All Might, he moved onto his next plan.
What are you talking about, Todoroki...?
What are you trying to tell me?
You have heard of Quirk marriages, right?
That thing that became a problem
for the second and third generation after superpowers appeared.
Choosing a spouse based only on
strengthening your own Quirk and passing it onto your children,
forcing people into marriage.
The old-fashioned way of thinking brought about by a lack of ethics.
He is a man with both accomplishments and money.
He won over my mother's relatives and got a hold of my mother's Quirk.
He is trying to fulfill his own desire by raising me to be
a hero to surpass All Might.
It is so annoying...
I will not become the tool of scum like that.
In my memories, my mother is always crying.
Your left side is unsightly,
my mother said as she poured boiling water on me.
Basically, I picked a fight with you to show him what I can do,
without using my damn old man's Quirk...
No...
I will reject him completely by winning first place without using it.
The world he talked about was so different that honestly, I was scared.
I thought about how it could be so different for us
even if we were aiming for the same thing.
I do not care if you cannot tell me how you are connected to All Might.
No matter what you are to All Might,
I will rise above you with just my right side.
Sorry for wasting your time.
If this were a comic, he would be the main character.
That was the kind of backstory he had.
Compared to that, what I could say...?
I have always been supported by others.
That was the case earlier, too.
I am here because of the people who have supported me.
It is all right now, young man.
I am here!
Is it possible for me to give him some of my points?
I will support you openly with everything I have got from now on!
You cannot be a hero with just one trick.
I guess it is like we have cleared the first hurdle.
Move!
You are in the way, Deku!
Team up with me, person in first place!
I took the one on his head where his guard was the weakest.
You can become a hero.
Saving people with a fearless smile, the greatest hero-
All Might.
I want to be like him.
In order to do that, I have to be strong enough to become number one.
My motivation might seem trivial compared to yours,
but I cannot lose, either.
I have to live up to the hopes of those who supported me.
That declaration of war you gave earlier-
I will return that.
I will beat you, too!
Now that lunch is over, it is finally time to reveal the last game!
But before that,
there is good news for all of you who did not make it to the finals!
This is just a sports festival!
So we have prepared recreational games that everyone can participate in, too!
Oh!
Yes!
Oh!
Yes!
Oh!
We have even brought real cheerleaders from America to liven things up!
Huh?
What are they doing?
What is the matter, Class A?
What kind of fan service is that?
Mineta!
Kaminari!
You tricked us, did not you?!
YOU.A. Sports Festival - Lunchtime
Yaoyorozu, Jiro.
Hm?
Did you need something?
Well, I am sure you already know since you are a class rep and all,
but they said everyone has to wear those clothes to do a cheer battle in the afternoon.
I did not hear anything about an event like that, though...
You do not have to believe me, but we heard from Mr. Aizawa.
I thought maybe you would forgotten, so I would tell you just in case.
Why am I always caught up in Mineta's schemes?
I even used Creation to make the outfits...
Those guys are so dumb!
Well, there is still time before the finals,
and it would be a pain if things got tense.
It is fine!
Let us do it!
What?!
Toru, you like this, huh?
All right, everyone!
Let us have fun competing in the recreational games!
When that is over, the sixteen from the four teams that made it to the final round
will duke it out tournament style, one-on-one!
The last round is a tournament where we fight one-on-one, huh?
I am going to stand on the stage that I watch every year on TV!
Was it a tournament last year?
It is different every year, but there is a one-on-one competition every year.
Last year, it was a sports chanbara match.
Now, let us draw lots to determine the bracket.
Once the bracket is determined, we will have the recreational games and then start!
The sixteen finalists can choose whether
or not they want to participate in the recreation.
I am sure some of you want to rest or save your strength.
Now, from the first place team-
Excuse me.
I am withdrawing.
Ojiro, why?
This is a rare chance for pros to see you!
I barely remember anything from the cavalry battle until almost the end.
I think it was that guy's Quirk.
If I remember correctly, Ojiro was with...
I know that this is a great chance
and that it is foolish to waste it...
Ojiro...
But-
Everyone here competed by giving their all!
I cannot...
I cannot be up there with everyone without knowing
what really happened.
You are worrying too much about it!
You should just make sure you produce results in the finals!
If you are going to say that, I did not do anything either.
That is not it...
I am talking about my pride here...
I cannot...
Also, why are you guys wearing cheerleader outfits?
Gulp!
I am Nirengeki Shoda from Class B.
I also want to withdraw for the same reason.
Regardless of ability,
do not you think it goes against the goal of this sports festival
for those who did not do anything to move onto the final round?
What is with these guys?!
They are so manly!
This is an unusual turn of events...
We will have to see what the chief umpire, Midnight, has to say about this...
Youthful talk like that is something...
Shoda!
Ojiro!
I accept your withdrawal!
She decided based on her tastes...!
I am going to do it, okay?
In that case, we will have to move up two people
from the fifth place cavalry battle team...
If that is what is going to happen,
then rather than us, who barely did anything during the cavalry battle,
it should be them, right?
Right?
The ones who fought to the end and stayed in the top,
Team Tetsutetsu, right?
Kendo...!
This is not collusion or anything.
It just makes sense.
Y-You guys...!
And so, Tetsutetsu and Shiozaki have moved up to make sixteen!
This is the bracket based on the results of the drawing!
Again?!
This is too redundant!
I will give it my all.
Th-That is what I want!
Merci.
Too bad you got me as your opponent.
You mean, too lucky!
The first match of the first round, huh?
If both Todoroki and I win, then...
Before that, if I remember correctly, Shinso was...
It is you, is not it?
Izuku Midoriya.
This person...
Depending on the results of the sports festival,
they will consider our transfer into the hero course.
Looking forward to the first match.
Me-
Midoriya!
Ojiro, what is the matter?
Do not answer him.
It will be sooner than I expected...
Come, Midoriya.
I will defeat you with this hand.
Huh?
Uraraka?
Are you Iida?
Hm?
Indeed, I am Iida.
Oh good!
Actually...
All right!
Let us leave the tournament aside for a momentary interlude!
Let us have fun with the recreation!
All right!
First is the scavenger hunt!
Bag
Will anyone let me borrow a bag?
Cat
Textbook
-A cat!
Please give me a cat!
-Does anyone have a textbook?
Back Fat
This is impossible...
Ugh, I cannot believe they are getting serious about recreational activities.
Thank you very much!
Those Class A guys really need to get a clue or something...
Monoma!
If you are unmotivated, then come with me!
Why?
Perverse Person
Kendo, do not you think you have got it wrong?
It is fine!
It fits!
Even if we were told to have fun,
those of us in the tournament could not relax.
Some polished their strategy against their opponent.
Some tried to keep their presence of mind.
Some prepared for the fight.
Some sharpened their senses.
And some tried to relax their nerves.
As we thought our respective thoughts,
it was time to start before we knew it.
Okay.
It is pretty much done.
Thank you, Cementoss!
Hey guys, are you ready?!
A lot's happened, but it is now come to this!
A serious battle!
You can only depend on yourself!
Even if you are not a hero, you will face lots of situations like that!
You get it, right?
Heart, skill, body, wisdom, and knowledge!
Use all of that to rush up!
Hey!
Sorry I am late, but...
You figured out One For All, right?
All Might...
No, I am still worried...
I can see it in my head by imagining the microwave and how I hit the villain,
but it still feels unsteady if I do not focus, like it will fall apart...
Besides, as you saw,
with my current body, even if I succeed,
I just end up with a little more power...
Yes, if we talk in terms of the zero or 100 from before,
what your body can release right now is about a five.
Five percent of my power?!
Hearing that, I really feel like I have been blessed with friends and luck.
You should just say, I will do my best, damn it, you prince of nonsense!
Is the image of the hero you are trying to be that flimsy?
Listen, it is the times when you are scared or worried
that you should deal with smiling!
You have made it this far.
It is fine if it is a bluff.
Stand proud!
Do not forget that I have got high hopes for you!
Audience!
The finals that you have all been waiting for are finally starting!
Match number one-
Even though he is done well, what is with that face?
Hitoshi Shinso Izuku Midoriya
From the hero course, it is Izuku Midoriya!
Versus-
Sorry, he has not done anything to stand out yet!
From general studies, it is Hitoshi Shinso!
The rules are simple.
Force your opponent out of bounds, or immobilize them!
You can also win by making your opponent say, I give up!
Bring on the injuries!
Because we have got our very own Recovery Girl waiting on standby!
Put your morals and ethics aside for a moment!
But of course, anything life-threatening is crap!
It is not allowed!
Heroes should only use their fists to catch villains!
I will stop things if they go too far.
I give up, huh?
This is a fight to test the strength of your spirit.
If you know what you want for your future,
then you cannot worry about appearances.
Ready?
That monkey was going on about his pride...
Start!
What did you say?!
I win.
I went through the trouble of warning him, too!
Hey, hey, what is the matter?
It is the important first match!
Liven things up!
Midoriya!
The match just started...
Preview
It is the finals tournament, Midoriya.
Ojiro, why did you want to talk to me all of a sudden?
I want to tell you what I know about the Quirk of Shinso from Class B,
your opponent in the first round.
Ojiro, you care about me that much?
That was part of it, but I also wanted to be in the preview.
So honest!
Wow!
Next time, Victory or Defeat!
Shouts of Do not worry about it will echo through the
stadium for the loser after the quick match.
Go beyond!
Next time: Victory or Defeat
Plus Ultra!
